message.body: Hey girl, how's your project? a little bird (karina) told me you were in a bit of a panic about it. i'm at home, but if you want to talk it through give me a call or email me images or something
Oh your nice I'm just a crazy person

Ha. Ok, just havin' your back. remember that the worst thing that can happen is that you make a bad piece of art. nbd. we're in the lucky position of being somewhere were we can take risks and fail and learn from it. that's why we're here, right?
Haha I know in really fine... Just got super lost for a moment, it hard not to have my paints and materials all the time. But I get to work with concept.... Just so different to unravel!
Totally! show it to me tomorrow?

Haha. It's not that art doesn't deal with context it's just that there is so much pressure for a solution where I never had to decide with painting- they usually told me. I just gotta learn to let the abstract ideas guide me

It must be incredibly difficult to work in such a drastically different mode. i'm impressed that you're so outside your comfort zone. if i could teleport i'd be all over studio-cuddle time, but as is, i'm eating cereal in my undies on the couch. pretty cozy. see you tomorrow
